mention.text: his proposals , in the pro-Beijing Hong Kong press
present alternatives that would be acceptable to the people of Hong Kong
some of the problems I have to disentangle before the end of this year
the Airport Committee of the Anglo-Chinese Joint Liaison Group - a place where consensus has been stalled for months
Mr Patten 's first visit to China as governor of Hong Kong
the colony 's 1994 local and 1995 legislative elections which provide for much greater democracy than has previously been the case in Hong Kong
